src:
Pomurska avtocesta zaradi nesreče zaprta med priključkoma Turnišče in Gančani proti Mariboru

06 Nov 2019, 11:57


Turnišče, 6. novembra - Pomurska avtocesta je zaprta zaradi prometne nesreče med priključkoma Turnišče in Gančani proti Mariboru, nastaja zastoj. Za osebna vozila je možen obvoz po regionalni cesti Turnišče-Renkovci-Gančani, poroča prometnoinformacijski center.
text:
The Pomurje highway closed due to the accident between the Turnisce and Gancani connections to Maribor

06 Nov 2019, 11:57


Turnisce, 6 November - The Pomurje highway is closed due to a traffic accident between Turnisce and Gancani towards Maribor. For cars, a detour along the Turnisce-Renkovci-Gancani regional road is possible, the Traffic Information Center reports.
